title: King.Arthur.Fallen.Champions.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
King.Arthur.Fallen.Champions.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Release Info:

Year: 2011
Genre: Add-on (Standalone) / Strategy (Real-time / Turn-based) / 3D
Developer: Neocore Games
Publisher: Paradox Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: ALI213




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Athlon 4000+ / Athlon X2 6000+
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 128 MB compatible with Shader Model 3 rd
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.5 GB


Game information:

In the world of strategy took a strong position game series,
which wove historical authenticity, magic and scenario fiction.
We are talking about the game "King Arthur: Fallen Champions",
which continues the series of King Arthur. This time you will
take part in the lives of three different characters. Lionel
Knight is busy saving the whole lady of his heart. If you do
not appreciate the love affairs, the fate of witches will
certainly appeal to you more. Lovers of fate hermit should
pay attention to a character named Drest Chosen: he goes
on his own path, which he dictated by the mysterious voice.
Whichever way you choose, the mass of adventure you provided.
Great graphics, exciting plot - all this allows the game
"King Arthur: Fallen Champions" to take its rightful place
in the collection of every lover of strategies.

Repack Features:

King Arthur: Fallen Champions
Version of the game - v1.0.0.6
Do not cut / recoded
Included crack text from AnTuxPucT
